content: Subzone of Marine Parade Planning Area in Singapore **Mountbatten** (also known as *Mountbatten Estate*) is a neighbourhood located in the planning area of [Marine Parade](/wiki/Marine_Parade), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). ## History The neighbourhood is named after [Lord Louis Mountbatten](/wiki/Lord_Louis_Mountbatten), the Supreme Allied Commander of the [South East Asia Command](/wiki/South_East_Asia_Command), [Governor General of India](/wiki/Governor_General_of_India) and British Military Administrator of [Malaya](/wiki/British_Malaya) from 1945 to 1946. ## Layout Mountbatten Road is a major thoroughfare that stretches all the way from the junction with [Nicoll Highway](/wiki/Nicoll_Highway), Guillemard Road and Sims Way (where Kallang Airport Way branches out from Sims Way) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang) to Haig Road in [Katong](/wiki/Katong) where it continues eastward as East Coast Road. ## Amenities ### Education - [Chung Cheng High School (Main)](/wiki/Chung_Cheng_High_School_(Main)) - Goodman Arts Centre (former [LASALLE College of the Arts](/wiki/LASALLE_College_of_the_Arts)) ### Shopping Centres - [Katong Shopping Centre](/wiki/Katong_Shopping_Centre) ## Points of interest - Katong Community Centre (formally Mountbatten CC) - Singapore Sindhi Association ## Notable places - [733 Mountbatten Road](/wiki/733_Mountbatten_Road) - Sing Hoe Hotel (formerly Sin Hoe) ## Transportation Mountbatten is served by [Mountbatten MRT station](/wiki/Mountbatten_MRT_station) and [Dakota MRT station](/wiki/Dakota_MRT_station) on the [Circle MRT line](/wiki/Circle_Line_(Singapore)). Both stations are situated beneath Old Airport Road. ## Gallery This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Mountbatten, Singapore
